summary: Mercenary James Shannon, on a reconnaissance job to the African nation of Zangaro, is tortured and deported. He returns to lead a coup.
cast: Christopher Walken|Tom Berenger|Colin Blakely|Hugh Millais|Paul Freeman|Jean-François Stévenin|JoBeth Williams|Robert Urquhart|Winston Ntshona|Pedro Armendáriz Jr.|Harlan Cary Poe|Ed O'Neill|Isabel Grandin|Ernest Graves|Kelvin Thomas|Shane Rimmer|Joseph Konrad|Bruce McLane|George Harris|David Schofield|Terence Rigby|Tony Mathews|John Quentin|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Christopher Malcolm|Jack Lenoir|André Penvern|Lawrence Davidson|Martin LaSalle|Maggie Scott|Hugh Quarshie|Olu Jacobs|Gyearbuor Asante|Thomas Baptiste|Eddie Tagoe|Kenny Ireland|Jim Broadbent|André Toffel|Diana Bracho|Ilario Bisi-Pedro|Joanne Flanagan|Robert Berger|William Cain|Russell T. Carr|José Rabelo|Victoria Tennant|Erica Creer|Sheila Ruskin|Alan Beckwith|Mason Cardiff|David Mandel|Angel Ramirez Jr.
title: Los perros de la guerra
